___markdown.description: Tells how to obtain the Markdown-formatted text.

___parameter.description: The place parameter for the flow definition to support anchors.

___url.description: The URL which refers to a Markdown-formatted text.

___resource.description: The resource topic under which Markdown-formatted text is expected or a URL which references to a file with Markdown-formatted text.

___attribute.description: Path to the actual Markdown-formatted text

___messages.description: Configuration of messages published via didEncounterError or didValidate events.

default._8_de: Die Ressource konnte nicht von "[url]" geladen werden.

___i18nFailedLoadingResource.description: The message to publish when a GET for a Markdown-formatted text source fails. [url] is replaced by the URL.

___i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

___locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.

name: laxar-markdown-display-widget
description: Obtains Markdown-formatted text or a reference to it from a resource and displays it as HTML.
